secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and calculate the [OBJ:expsec_ps16:average kinetic energy] of an atom or molecule.
2. Define and calculate the [OBJ:expsec_ps18:root-mean-square molecular speed] of a gas atom or molecule.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_38628:Calculate] the average kinetic energy of an atom.
2. [OBJ:qc_38630:Calculate] the rms of a molecule.
Quick Review: Average Kinetic Energy of Molecule, RMS Speed Molecular Speed
